title: Ex of Jersey Shore's JWoww slammed for giving kids fake cigarettes for Halloween costumes
text:

JWoww's ex husband has been slammed for giving their children fake cigarettes to go with their Halloween costumes.

Roger Matthews, who was married to the Jersey Shore star from 2015 until earlier this year, dressed their two children up as Danny Zuko and Bad Sandy from Grease.

He took to Instagram to share a few photos of little Greyson, three, and Meilani, five, in matching leather jackets, shades and skinny jeans, finishing their costumes off with a toy cigarette each.

Roger, 44, knew he would face criticism for the smokes, and dared anyone to say something or risk getting blocked from viewing his feed.

(Image: rogermathewsnj /Instagram)

(Image: Getty)

He wrote: "Never was there a better Danny Zuko and Sandra D. Grease came to New Hope Railroad.

"Please comment on the fake cigarettes so I can block you. Please.

"They nailed the role and if you don’t get it you most certainly would never get us."

(Image: rogermathewsnj /Instagram)

Video Loading Video Unavailable Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now

And the comments were quickly flooded with criticism, who said they were too young for such grown up accessories.

One posted: "Omg cigarettes!!! Come on, you're a f***ing dad, aren't you suppose to keep them away from cancer??"

"Not liking it. They’re too little," another commented.

(Image: MediaPunch/Rex)

A third said: "You could have done this without the cigarettes bro. As a smoker I don't think it was a good idea.'

"How cute! Teaching this innocent little kids about cigarettes," another sarcastically commented.

Another wrote: "The outfits are so cute and the cigarettes just took it to far. Made it not cute."
description: Roger Matthews dressed their two children up as Danny Zuko and Bad Sandy from Grease complete with fake cigarettes
